implementation: Pure GWO with Random Constraint Enforcement
reference: Mirjalili et al. (2014), Emary et al. (2016)

bug_fixes.cause: numpy scalar types (np.int64, np.float64) not accepted
bug_fixes.solution: Explicit type conversion to Python native int

bug_fixes.issue: TypeError: optimize() got an unexpected keyword argument "callback"
bug_fixes.cause: optimize method did not accept a callback parameter
bug_fixes.solution: Added optional callback parameter to optimize() and invoked it within the loop

bug_fixes.cause: Calculation was `2.0 - 2.0 * iteration / self.max_iterations` which resulted in `a` being 2.0 at the last iteration instead of 0.0

constraint_enforcement.description: Unbiased random add/remove to satisfy [min, max] constraints
constraint_enforcement.rationale: Preserves GWO stochastic exploration, aligned with literature
